column5: http://ca.humminbird.com/products/341323/RF25 Anyone have any feedback on this product? Seems interesting enough, especially for me as more a shore fisherman than on a boat. Please let me know if its good or a ware if $90.00. Thank you.

I've heard good things about the Smartcast series. But mostly from Kayakers and Canoers' with limited alternatives. Looks like it would be tough to view and jig at the same time   Edit* I did see a wrist watch type one for sale on Kajiji in Sudbury
Thanks for the info. I appreciate it.
Get the one with the wrist watch instead of rhe rod mount.
Any reason why? I was leaning towards the rob mount. Figure it's easier to follow
